Orion’s offering at Mainstay is a pleasant contemporary studio style getaway with a homey and cozy feel.
The interior space has been utilized well and gives a larger than presumed feel. Although more of a studio layout, with the bed/living/dining/kitchen sharing one elongated room, the choices of furniture and placement disabuse any travelers of claustrophobic feelings. The fixtures and appliances are modern and yet there is an older comfort to the space. Functional yet warm and inviting.
The renovated bathroom is delightful and offset from the primary space, further enhancing the perception of interior size and adding an element of privacy. There are plenty of space for luggage and clothes. Parking is ample, but pay attention to guidance provided so all vehicles are accommodated. The back porch and fire pit only add to the ambiance of the wonderful destination that is “Mainstay”.
